      Adds the passed in object to this object's project_team_members ArrayList.
      int calculate_project_team_distance_sum_difference()
      Calculates the team distance by summing the absolute value of the difference between the required project skill weighting from the assigned students skills weighting.
      int calculate_project_team_distance_sum_minus_sum()
      Calculates the team distance by subtracting the total required project skills weightings from the total of already assigned students skills weightings.
      int calculate_unassigned_skills_weightings()
      Calculate the total skill weighings of all unassigned skills belonging to this Project Object.

      Iterates through lecturer_skills ArrayList looking for unassigned skills.

      Iterates through lecturer_skills array to find highest modified skill weighting value and returns it.
      int get_total_project_skill_weightings()
      Sums the total skills weighting in the required skills list (lecturer_skills) for the current project object.
      int get_total_student_skills_weightings()
      Sums the total skills weighting for students in the current project_team_member list for the current project object.

      • getA_project_team_member

        public ProjectTeamMember getA_project_team_member(int assigned_skill_id)
        Iterates over the projectTeamMembers arrays list in order to find an object that matches the given assigned_skill_id parameter. When a match is found, it returns the projectTeamMember object.
        Parameters:
        assigned_skill_id - - integer to search for
        Returns:
        - projectTeamMember object, or null if no match found

      • getA_lecturer_skill

        public Skill getA_lecturer_skill(int skill_id)

        skill_id - - an integer to be set
        Returns:
        - a Skill object

      • skills_based_on_weighting

        public java.util.ArrayList<ProjectSkill> skills_based_on_weighting(int weighting)
        Builds an array of skills whose skill weighting value matches the given parameter value, then returns the array list.
        Parameters:
        weighting - - an integer to be matched
        Returns:
        - ArrayList of ProjectSkill objects

      • calculate_unassigned_skills_weightings

        public int calculate_unassigned_skills_weightings()
        Calculate the total skill weighings of all unassigned skills belonging to this Project Object. Functions iterates through lecturer_skills list and checks if the skills 'assigned' attribute is marked false. If marked false, the weighting is added to total, otherwise it is ignored.
        Returns:
        - an integer

      • get_total_project_skill_weightings

        public int get_total_project_skill_weightings()
        Sums the total skills weighting in the required skills list (lecturer_skills) for the current project object.
        Returns:
        - an integer

      • get_total_student_skills_weightings

        public int get_total_student_skills_weightings()
        Sums the total skills weighting for students in the current project_team_member list for the current project object.
        Returns:
        - an integer

      • check_unassigned_skills

        public boolean check_unassigned_skills()
        Iterates through lecturer_skills ArrayList looking for unassigned skills. If unassigned skill found, returns true. Else if no unassigned skill found, returns false.
        Returns:
        a boolean value

      • get_unallocated_skill

        public ProjectSkill get_unallocated_skill()
        Iterates lecturer_skills list and returns first unallocated skill. Lecturer_skill list is shuffle to make it random.
        Returns:
        - Project skill object or null.

      • calculate_project_team_distance_sum_difference

        public int calculate_project_team_distance_sum_difference()
        Calculates the team distance by summing the absolute value of the difference between the required project skill weighting from the assigned students skills weighting. If no student has been assigned, treated as a zero weighting
        Returns:
        - an integer value
